texts.name: Nzistov
texts.biography: The Gelugons have a very strict internal hierarchy. Nzistov was the oldest gelugon, who, among other things, had great magical power. Therefore, he was able to become the most important among these insect-like demons. The Gelugons under the command of Nzistov fight tirelessly to earn respect in the eyes of the elder.

specialty.description:
{Gelugons}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Gelugons or Supreme Gelugons he commands for each level reached after 6th level.
